items.description: A path within the template source.

items.description: A path within the template source.

lastSyncTime.description: When the source was last synced.

EnvironmentMappingUpdateProperties.description: Properties of an environment mapping. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created

mappedSubscriptionId.description: Id of a subscription that the environment type will be mapped to. The environment's resources will be deployed into this subscription.

projectId.description: Resource Id of a project that this mapping is associated with.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

EnvironmentMappingUpdate.description: The environment mapping for partial update. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties to configure a mapping between an environment type and a subscription or management group. Resources for environments of this configured type will be deployed to this subscription or management group.

principalId.description: The principal id of the resource identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the resource. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: The type of identity used for the resource. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a user assigned identity. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the resource.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

TrackedResourceUpdate.description: Base tracked resource type for PATCH updates

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

nextLink.description: URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation

description.description: Localized friendly description for the operation

OperationStatus.description: The current status of an async operation

id.description: Fully qualified ID for the operation status.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation

endTime.description: The end time of the operation

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete

properties.description: Custom operation properties, populated only for a successful operation.

EnableStatus.description: Enable or disable status. Indicates whether the property applied to is either enabled or disabled.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Fidalgo service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Fidalgo service.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Unique identifier of the Azure subscription. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

TemplateSourceNameParameter.name: templateSource
TemplateSourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Template Source.

EnvironmentTypeNameParameter.name: environmentType
EnvironmentTypeNameParameter.description: The name of the environment type.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply to the operation. Example: '$filter=contains(name,'myName')

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of resources to return from the operation. Example: '$top=10'

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The ID of an ongoing async operation
